titleStmt.title: By the Queene. Forasmuch as vpon the lamentable complaynt made vnto the Queenes most excellent Maiestie by sundry her louing subiects the clothiers of diuers parts of the realme, and of a multitude of other people mainteined in their handlabours by them: ...
Proclamations. 1576-11-28
